abstract: For NBC’s coverage of 13 Olympic sports, the announcers are not in Beijing, but in New York.
snippet: For NBC’s coverage of 13 Olympic sports, the announcers are not in Beijing, but in New York.
lead_paragraph: For NBC’s coverage of 13 Olympic sports, the announcers are not in Beijing, but in New York: at 30 Rockefeller Plaza actually, on the temporarily vacated set of “Saturday Night Live,” inside 14-foot-wide booths “that are equipped with 24-inch HD monitors and headsets that pipe in the ambient sounds from the game sites,” Richard Sandomir reports.

headline.main: Olympics: In the Announcers’ Booth, but Not in Beijing
